about_the_game:
This definitive collection includes all Virtua Fighter title's original soundtracks plus 220 unreleased tracks from the series history!

Also included is the opening song from Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O, "Burning Souls" and Jacky's newly arranged theme "Dont Think, Feel" from Virtua Fighter 3tb, both composed by SEGA legend Takenobu Mitsuyoshi


Includes:
・ Burning Soul - Single -
・ Virtua Fighter OST
・ Virtua Fighter 2 OST
・ Virtua Fighter 3 OST
・ Virtua FIghter 4 OST
・ Virtua FIghter 4 Evo & Final Tuned OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 R OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 Final Showdown OST
・ VF.TV OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. OST DISC1
・ Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. OST DISC2
・ Virtua Fighter Kids OST
・ Virtua Fighter Virtua Quest OST
・ Virtua Fighter Unreleased Tracks
detailed_description:
This definitive collection includes all Virtua Fighter title's original soundtracks plus 220 unreleased tracks from the series history!

Also included is the opening song from Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O, "Burning Souls" and Jacky's newly arranged theme "Dont Think, Feel" from Virtua Fighter 3tb, both composed by SEGA legend Takenobu Mitsuyoshi


Includes:
・ Burning Soul - Single -
・ Virtua Fighter OST
・ Virtua Fighter 2 OST
・ Virtua Fighter 3 OST
・ Virtua FIghter 4 OST
・ Virtua FIghter 4 Evo & Final Tuned OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 R OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 Final Showdown OST
・ VF.TV OST
・ Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. OST DISC1
・ Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. OST DISC2
・ Virtua Fighter Kids OST
・ Virtua Fighter Virtua Quest OST
・ Virtua Fighter Unreleased Tracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 16 GB available space

short_description: Featuring the original soundtracks of every Virtua Fighter title since the series's creation, this collection also includes more than 200 tracks never officially released, as well as more than 20 unused songs from across the series's history!
